inn1.comm: sharp away movement from a good length outside off stump right away, left alone
even better, this one pitched a lot fuller and closer to Tharanga, drew his forward into a loose drive, and swerved away to beat the outside edge
Zaheer is getting it to do too much, another one yo-yos away from a length, this time Tharanga holds his bat well inside the line
lot fuller this time, and he pushed forward, covering for the away movement and gets it straight past the non-striker
pushed away on the off side
thickish outside edge as he digs it in back of a length, down to third man
moving away after pitching on a length around leg, dropped softly on the off side for one
wobbles and shapes away widish from Dilshan, who steadies himself and thumps it hard, but the mistimed stroke takes the ball to extra cover
fine leave, saw it angle in and leaving him close to off stump and shouldered arms in the end
too wide, and short, Dilshan accepts the offering, winds up and crashes it through cover
wide again, but pitched up this time, and he lets it go as it moves away
PK gets some bounce but again serves it up short and wide, Dilshan gleefully bashes it past covers
slides it just down leg with the angle from over the stumps
straightening from short of a length on middle, tharanga was looking to work it on the leg side and adjusted to defend down the track
excellent delivery, holds its line after being darted in around off, Tharanga pushes at it and is beaten

this was coming, Zaheer has toyed with Tharanga, who was getting nowhere against all that movement, he tried advancing down the track to take on Zaheer, but played a half-hearted weak push at one that left him to loop to Sachin at first slip
straightens right away just outside off stump, Sanga gets across and softly defends
Zaheer is in top gear here, gets it to bounce and straighten from back of a length at 137 kph, Sanga leaves immediately
finds bounce first ball from a short length, on target too, a surprised Dilshan weaves out of the line
left alone outside off as it shapes away a tad
terrific delivery from Vinay, coming in with the angle, drawing Dilshan out, and then leaving him sharply to beat the edge
holds its line some way outside off, Dilshan takes a step out and across and shoulders arms
almost played on, almost, uncertainly pushing at a straighter one ending around off, inside edge on to the back leg and just past the stumps
zip, bounce, away shape, left alone, this is not the bowler who made his Test debut at this ground
gets well across to counter the away shape Zaheer is getting, ends up outside off stump, and defends down the track

leading edge for a boundary through point, Sanga getting lucky, the straighter line made him look for runs towards midwicket, the ball then shaped away to take the edge and went in the air past backward point
pushed back down the pitch
slight width outside off, flashed hard down to third man
if it is pitched up he is going after it, that is what he does, Zaheer slants it across on a fuller length, and Dilshan throws his bat at it, not quite timed, but in the gap past extra cover
left alone as it moves away from a length outside off
tests him with the bouncer at the head, Dilshan looks to hook belatedly, and it flies over the keeper off the helmet
some serious zip and bounce from Vinay, Dilshan does well to leave it alone
pitched fuller, trying to tempt him into the drive, and then shaping away a tad, Dilshan leaves once more
shorter and wider, cut hard down to third man
he is getting a long way across looking to get behind the line of the ball, defends solidly this time
pitched fuller at 139 kph and starting to come in around off, he gets forward and smothers it
cramped for room with one coming back from short of a length on middle, still manages to force it behind point
hangs back and across to a good length ball and punches it in front of cover, a clean pick-up could have tested them
fine shot, Dilshan got the fuller length, but did not look to go through extra cover, instead he pushed it hard down the ground past mid off
cut straight to backward point
playing the one holding its line from the crease, and pushing on the off side
fuller and straighter on middle, he nudges it towards midwicket for one
Dilshan tries to take on Vinay, he backs away and tries to scythe the pitched up ball through extra cover, but is beaten by the away movement
belated attempt to leave one outside off, and it dribbles off the bat to third man
well across, and nudges one from around off to midwicket for one
swinging away after being angled in full on middle and leg, pushed hard to mid on
excellent stroke, Vinay gives Dilshan some width with the pitched up delivery, he drives it with the away movement, and it races between the bowler and widish mid off
length ball defended solidly on the off side
was setting himself up across to play for the away movement, this one carried in with the angle and bounced sharply, Sanga did well to adjust and keep it down
stays in the crease to a length ball moving away and slashes it in the air down to third man
pushes a pitched up delivery on middle and leg, back to Zaheer
worked in front of square leg for one
solidly defended off the front foot on to the leg side
holding its line slightly widish outside off, left alone
opens the face and runs it to point as it straightens on off
Vinay gives Dilshan the short ball, and he tears into it, smacks the pull off the middle of the bat through square leg
good work at extra cover, Dilshan had gone hard at this one and stroked it on the up, extra cover dived to his left to stop a certain boundary
pushed softly behind point for one
gets bat in front of pad to work this straightening length delivery down to fine leg
slides it across the left-hander outside off, Sanga leaves
shortish from PK, and Sanga swivels to check the pull in front of square leg
throws his bat at a pitched up delivery outside off, which moves away to beat the stroke
pushes it down leg from back of a length
short, wide, PK hasn't been consistent with the length today, but he has some protection at sweeper cover now
stays in the crease and defends a length ball softly onto the off side
shaping across Sanga from short of a length, he cannot guide it past point
Sanga had gone too far up the track as Dilshan pushed towards cover and had to scramble back in as the throw came in
holding its line on a good length on off stump, defended tightly again
worked wide of mid on for a run
moving in to the left-hander, but ends up going down leg
better line, ending just around off stump from a good length, defended back to the bowler
struck on the thigh pad with one that comes in from back of a length, the ball rolls away on the off side
another one moves in, but it pitched fuller, Sanga came forward and across, and flicked superbly between mid on and midwicket, was in the air for a while
pushes well forward to defend, not exactly cleanly, on the off side
shortish length allows him to move across and work towards mid on for one
good work from Zaheer running across at sweeper cover, it looked like going for four as Sanga made room to slice it high over point, but Zaheer ran across and put in the slide to just haul it back in
worked eagerly off the pads behind square leg, and they come back for the second comfortably
a run and a diving stop from Raina at extra cover keeps them to one
coming in from a length on off stump, he works it with the angle through square leg
tucked with the spin through midwicket
short delivery, but he cannot guide it past backward point
another short one spinning away, bit of bounce, dilshan is beaten on the cut as he reaches out for it
chops a fuller one past slip as he looks to cut once more
moves across to nudge one from middle and leg towards square leg, Dhoni goes after it
this time he makes room and gets the cut away past point as Jadeja continues to give him width from short of a length
pushed to extra cover as it moves across the left-hander after pitching around leg
takes PK on with a charge, slices the length ball into the ground and past a lunging backward point
pushed straight to mid on and he is not getting the single
straightish one worked in front of square leg
carries on in with the angle from a good length, pushed to mid on
hangs beside the line in the crease and flashes it down to third man
bounce from around the stumps, Dilshan rides it and cuts hard, straight to point
spinning down the pads, rolls away to short fine leg
ending on leg from a good length, he nudges it to midwicket
going across Dilshan around middle, worked in front of square leg
diving stop at midwicket off a fuller one
Ashwin starts with a maiden to Dilshan who pushes this fullish one back to him
Zaheer starts off after drinks and immediately gets it to straighten outside off, pushed away to covers
opens up a tad to a back of a length ball and pushes wide of extra cover
pitching on off stump and straightening, defended quietly

superb take from Dhoni, Zaheer has broken the partnership, but he also has Dhoni to thank for pulling off a screamer, Zaheer got Sanga to push at one straightening and bouncing from just short of a length, the edge flew to where first slip would have been, Dhoni went leaping horizontally after it with outstretched arms and held on
angled widish across the right-hander, left alone
moves across outside off and defends the angled delivery
down the track to a tossed up ball and nudges it in the air towards midwicket, has to get back
misses the work on the leg side as he moves across
pushed from the crease to midwicket
short, and turning down leg, helped down to fine leg
turning down the leg side from around the stumps
nudged off the front foot towards vacant square leg for an easy single
comes forward and defends with an inside edge on the leg side, Ashwin getting good bounce
gets across and forward and defends a length ball
worked behind square leg for one
tries to clobber a pitched up delivery down the ground but mistimes the stroke
uses the angle to work for one in front of square leg
fine push down the track, Zaheer goes down in his followthrough, gets his left hand out, the ball trickles on to the stumps, but Dilshan was well in
worked off the pads towards midwicket
comes down the track as he sees the flight, but it pitches and bounces in to him, and he nudges it softly on the leg side
worked in front of square leg
skips outside the crease and clips with the spin in front of square leg
goes hard on the drive to a fuller one angled across and gets it past cover
stays back to a flighted full one on middle and leg and works it to midiwicket
cut straight to point who cannot stop it cleanly but recovers well to prevent the single
pushed through full on off, pushed down the track
comes down to the flighted ball and eases it to long on
tossed up ball pushed back to Jadeja
tries to cut this length ball which is slightly outside off, ends up chopping it away
pushed on the off side
not wide enough for the cut, bouncing too, he cannot get the stroke past backward point
straightish length ball around off, he tries to move across but ends up pushing it straighter than he would have liked to
wide from PK, Chandimal reaches out and goes for the cut, Virat is in the way at point, he stops it to his right and fires in the throw at the non-striker's, Dilshan has to rush back
on middle and leg, worked behind square leg, Sehwag is not exactly quick in going after it, and they come back for two
pushes away from the body and defends down the track
way too wide from PK, would have been called one had the batsman not gone after it and slapped it to sweeper cover
moves well across and paddles this one fine on the leg side from off stump
down the track as he sees the flight, ends up pushing it away tentatively
shortish and spinning away, he rocks back and cuts hard through point
arm ball slides in from a good length, he is beaten on the cut
this one bounces now from a length, Dilshan gets hold of the cut this time but cannot beat backward point
well done, he was getting nowhere trying to power it away, so he delayed the shot and dabbed it behind point who had no chance
moves across and works wide of midwicket
beaten as he flashes at one that holds its line outside off stump and then swings sharply away after it passes the bat
chops it towards the keeper on the off side, Dhoni runs in but cannot pick up the ball even as he takes off his glove to throw
Chandimal does not let the poor line go unpunished, he moves across to one sliding into the pads, and uses the angle to nudge it fine and wide of the man at fine leg
beaten this time as he wafts at one pitching shortish and moving away from him outside off
pitched up delivery pushed back to PK who throws it back towards Chandimal's stumps aggressively
Dilshan finds point with the cut once again

poor throw from Virat after a fine stop prevents a certain run out, Chandimal had no way of getting in after going too hard for the single, Dilshan had set off initially after driving to Virat's right, but Virat's throw was wide and bounced awkwardly at Jadeja

Virat gets the chance to make up for that wide throw and does superbly to hold on to a very low catch at point, he pouches it and screams, Dilshan was looking to cut almost everything from Jadeja and could not keep this very wide one down
moves across and nudges behind square leg
pushes back the tossed up ball to Jadeja
another one beaten on the cut, Jadeja is getting some spin and lots of bounce, but they are throwing their bat at everything slightly short
left alone as it bounces and moves away outside off
another one left alone outside off
outside edge as Mahela pushes forward with a slightly open face, just falls short of the man at widish slip
moves eagerly across this time, and nudges on the leg side
nippy length delivery smothered on the off side
dabs a widish one down to third man, was in the air for a while

big appeal for lbw, Mahela struck on the pad as he pushes forward, it was the arm ball, he was a long way forward, and the bounce at Perth always puts doubt in the umpires' minds, replays show it would have just touched the top of the bails
tries to paddle from way outside off, and gets a top edge behind point
pushes well forward and out to sweeper cover
makes a bit of room and pushes in front of point
widish, as has been PK's tendency today, cut to point
pitched up this time, pushed down the track
wide again, flashes at the cut, on the bounce to Ashwin at third man
that's the way to play the cut, Mahela off the front foot, delays the shot to get it wide of a diving point and a lumbering Ashwin has no chance running across from third man
reaches out a to a pitched up wide one and guides it to point
whoa, Mahela is surviving some close moments, he walked down the track, wanted to work this one from outside off on the leg side, the leading edge went just over point
pushed to extra cover off the front foot
chipped down to long off, was in the air for a long time
worked to midwicket
misses the paddle as he tries to take it from outside off
another cut finds Virat Kohli at backward point, busy man
quickish full one pushed off the inner part of the bat to Jadeja
holding its line outside off stump, left alone as it bounces
wider and moving further away, called one this time
PK has been mostly wide today, Mahela can flash at this one, thickish edge down to third man
gets across and punches to extra cover
whipped down to fine leg off the pad
well bowled, nipping in from a good length, Mahela gets bat down just in time
defends on the off side and looks for one, but cover is quick to get to the ball
down the track and clips in front of square leg
flighted full, he waits for it but ends up pushing it back to the bowler
pushed softly in front of cover for one
skips out and eases the full one to long off
tries to entice him with a wide tossed up ball, Mahela goes for it but keeps it along the ground to sweeper cover
another one tossed up with some width, hit hard down to long off
some away shape but well played, pushed softly wide of sweeper cover and they have time to take two
gets across and whips wristily on the bounce to square leg, from where Sachin fires in the throw to the non-striker's while looking at the batsman, there was no one to collect it
flicked fine off the pads
hangs back and slogs hard as he swivels, does not look great to watch but he will get four to the deep midwicket boundary
easily done, straightish gentle length ball on off, he moves across and works it square on the leg side
comes in around the off stump, but he does well to run it towards third man
dives and gets a hand to the drive to his left, parries it to extra cover but they will take the run
well done, Chandimal advances out quickly and swings it straight down the ground, not much chance for long on
shortish one now, cut away to sweeper cover
pushed down to long off
nudged wide of midwicket who puts in a slide to his left but cannot prevent the single
short of a length ball on middle and leg, worked behind square leg
Ashwin cannot cut off the single as he slides to his right
full one pushed back to the bowler
full again, this time he gets it down to long on
that was close, that was dropped in fact, Mahela got a very thick edge as he looked to dab a bouncing one late, very tough for the keeper, it dribbles away off Dhoni's gloves
worked square on the leg side
beaten on the cut with a quick and bouncing delivery
fuller one pushed to extra cover
backs away and cuts a quickish length ball to sweeper cover, been the favoured shot today, the cut
defended on the off side close to the pitch
very well done, Jadeja is bowling them flat and quick, ending just outside off, Mahela makes room neatly and dabs it to the third man boundary
defended towards point off the front foot
worked behind square leg off the pads
bounce and turn from off stump, nudged fine on the leg side
another one worked with the spin behind square leg
nudged to midwicket

gone! Mahela departs, sweeps from off straight to deep square leg, well judged low take from Rohit on the boundary, Mahela had moved across and fetched it from around off stump, was a bit off balance as he played the shot
makes a bit of room and slaps it straight to cover
beautiful delivery squares him up outside off and there was a sound and Hotspot shows a thin outside edge but the umpire Llong didn't pick that up, Dhoni and the rest appealed
another jaffa and this time it clips his thigh pad and flies to the keeper, good decision this time though, Zaheer's really posing questions
beats him outside off! Zaheer in top form, close to the off stump there
tucks it towards square leg and Sehwag dives to save it and Kohli nearly collides and takes a tumbles after jumping over Sehwag
comes round the wicket and he drifts on the body, he flicks it to fine leg
flattish length ball on leg stump, he awkwardly swings it to deep square
spins away sharply from a length outside off, slapped past point
tossed up slowly, spinning down the pads, loops behind square
sharp turn again, starts around middle and off, and bounces across the push from Perera
down the track and chips it over the bowler, Zaheer gets across from long on
turns in to the pads from middle, he cannot work it away
runs in furiously and starts off with a wayward bouncer, too high over the batsman's head
plays a 136 kph length delivery late and drops it on the off side for one
some width from back of a length,slapped hard off the front foot but PK dives at cover to save the boundary
tries to stay back and smash it on the up through the off side, beaten by the bounce
shortish one into him now, he heaves it awkwardly down to long on
he continues the shortish length against Chandimal, who heaves it off the front foot, not timed well, but enough to go into the deep midwicket boundary
fifty for Dinesh Chandimal with a purposeful shuffle across and a work square on the leg side, holds his bat up, continues to grow as a batsman
length ball worked from leg stump to short fine leg
dabbed to backward point for one
down the track and swung on a couple of bounces to deep square leg

Ashwin gets another one, Perera advanced out to have a heave, was beaten as the tossed up ball spun away, he got the foot back on the crease, but could not get it behind the line as Dhoni removed the bails
nudged as it bounces on leg, Sachin's throw from short fine leg is wide to Ashwin, and the non-striker is able to get away after having backed up too far
moves across and defends a bouncing delivery on middle
works a nippy one angled in on middle behind square leg
chops this one from close to off stump down to third man
back of a length ball dropped in front of point for a single
straightish one middle and off, again he shuffles enough to be able to work it behind square leg
plays out a bouncing back of a length ball to point
fuller delivery patted back to the bowler
nudged calmly behind square leg for one
hit down to long on for another single
well stopped by Virat at deep midwicket, it had been heaved hard but Virat ran hard to his left, and dived to stop it on the bounce
tries to makes room and dab one ending on leg, thick inside edge onto leg
leading edge now, but well over Ashwin and down to long off
length ball whipped behind square leg for one
ending on leg stump, easily nudged in front of square leg for one
whipped to short fine leg for one more
punched through vacant midwicket, Jadeja goes running after it and puts in a slide to keep them to one
skips out and slogs hard between deep midwicket and long on for a couple
bowled slower this time, he has no pace to work with and pats it back to Jadeja
pushed softly towards point for one

Dhoni has done well to complete the stumping, Chandimal walked out, reached the tossed up carrom ball on the full, but missed, and it turned away sharply from him after pitching outside leg, and thudded into Dhoni's gloves hard just outside off, Dhoni was startled for a bit, but with Chandimal way down the track, he got the bails off eventually
beaten as he pushes at one spinning away sharply from him
pushed away towards point
defended towards point off the front foot
superb stuff from Ashwin, beats him after drawing him forward, gets it to turn away and bounce
they take on the bowler after Angelo drops the shortish one close to the crease, Vinay runs hard towards the ball and leaps to lob it towards the stumps, but Thirimanne is in
awkwardly plays the pull as he is hurried by the short ball, it loops weakly down to long on
smacks the pull hard as he gets the short delivery, on the bounce to deep midwicket
opens the face and guides a very full one down to third man, a wayward throw from Zaheer allows them one more
excellent stop from Jadeja at backward point, lunges to his right and puts in the dive with outstretched hands to stop the ball which had been driven hard
phooey, that has been smoked past mid off, a walk down the track and an emphatic swing, the ball just disappeared
full delivery paddled fine down the leg side for a couple, striker had to dive back in for the second, PK winces after he throws from the deep
slapped through point for one
gets it to bounce down the leg side and hits Dhoni on the thumb and in the stomach, he manages a smile
nudged square on the leg side for one, he has got a lot of bounce out of this pitch
quicker one hurrying in, he shapes up for the pull, but underedges it on the off side

run out by a mile and more to spare, it was guided straight to backward point, there was no single, Thirimanne wanted it, was stranded halfway down the pitch and had no chance of getting back as the throw came in to the keeper
pushes a tossed up ball to midwicket, and that ends a superb spell from Ashwin
tight line from a good length right away on off stump, tentatively nudged to the leg side, Zaheer runs towards it and fields

smashes it with the angle through midwicket, Vinay runs to his left in the deep and puts in the slide, manages to parry it away even as he tumbles head-first into the boundary, sees the ball start to trickle onto the rope, and somehow manages to extricate himself from the clutches of the rope and kick the ball back in
whipped away towards midwicket for one
lines up the pull initially, then sees it is angled a long way across him, tries to upper cut it, misses

tries to swing a pitched up delivery out of the ground, it goes high in the air, towards the long on boundary, Raina runs after it, parries it in on the bounce, another man does the throwing-in, Raina crashes into the boundary boards with all the running, and takes down a security guard with him
worked in front of square leg for one
slower length ball slapped away to deep point
pitched up ball lifted over the in-field and wide of sweeper cover
pitched up again, driven in the air down to long off
very full and wide outside off, he reaches out and dabs it to point
well bowled, loopy full and wide slower one from back of the hand, Kula was surprised and was beaten as he had a go at it
now a slower one almost in the blockhole around off, patted back to Vinay
goes after a very wide one and slaps it wide of sweeper cover for two
length ball on the pads now, Zaheer lucky it was taken for only one to fine leg
attempted pull to a sharp bouncer lands safely short of fine leg
goes for the yorker outside off stump, Angelo stays in the crease and squeezes it fine of the third man fielder
very full and wide outside off again, dabbed straight to point
swings at a low full toss and gets it wide of third man for a couple, Kula and Dhoni run into each other as the batsman completes the second, they hold the embrace for a bit and let go, all smiles
pitched up ball hit powerfully down to long off, couple of bounces before it flies to him
Kula backs away and has a slog, the edge flies vertically behind point, Rohit sets himself under it, and scrambles to take it safely as it eventually comes down
diving stop from Sehwag at short fine leg saves the boundary, it had been worked well by Angelo and was travelling
Malinga backs away and inside-out forehands the length ball to extra cover
slower one, he is surprised initially and recovers to flash it wide of third man, the throw is high at Dhoni's end, and Angelo's long drawn-out drive has helped him make the crease
stopped well by Dhoni, it was headed for four else, Angelo getting a thick edge to a very low full toss

inn2.comm: pushes away from the body and runs the pitched up delivery past wide gully
hangs his bat inside the line as Malinga shapes a length delivery away from him, finds decent bounce too
shaping away once again, from a good length, slightly wider and Sachin lets it go right away
gets one on the pads and works it wristily behind square for a couple even as it bounces
solidly forward to a 142 kph pitched up delivery and pushes it to mid off
leaves a widish delivery outside off alone
takes on the pitched up delivery right away, Kula bowls it at 128 kph, and Sehwag tees off with an open face over extra cover
swinging in from a good length and ending on off, he tightly defends with a straight bat
pushed to extra cover
nipping back in but ending down the pads, worked to fine leg
pushes the length delivery hard but cannot time it past a diving backward point
this time he slaps it in the gap past cover for a couple
short, wide, and Sehwag latches on, ends up on one leg as he dismisses it through point
straighter and on the stumps, pushed to mid on
oh well, Sehwag gives it away, short and wide from Malinga, Sehwag hops and forces it over the in-field, but third man is around and he runs to his right to gleefully hold on
back and across and defends a rising short of a length ball
slung in on to the pads and Virat helps it away with a tuck wide of fine leg
bounce from back of a length, dropped softly towards covers
worked towards midwicket for a single
moves back and across and defends a length ball down the track
getting across all the time, and pushes away a length ball to covers
tries to push on the up but mistimes it towards point
dead-bats a length ball to cover, right forward, head on top, the works
almost a repeat of the forward defensive previous ball
moving away and bouncing but starting too far outside off
shot of the day, Tendulkar gets a long way forward, front foot across and eases the length delivery with a firm push past mid off
Malinga drags the length a shade back, and shapes it away, Tendulkar leaves
hopping in the crease and punching a rising delivery neatly to mid off
bent the knee and wanted to go after this fuller one, but it bounced a lot and he withdrew his bat in the end
crash! not that short, but he set himself up on the front foot, got the back leg across nicely and smacked it in front of cover
good comeback from Malinga, short ball takes off close to off stump, Sachin weaves out comfortably
Virat continues to go back and across a long way, and defends a length ball
inside edge saves Virat as a 143.8 kph pitched up delivery crashes into his thigh pad
another inside edge, Prasad is sharp with the pitched up length, it comes back in at 139.1 kph, Virat does not get across this time, pushes half-forward, inside edge cannons into the box
this time he gets across to a similar one angled in and works it comfortably to square leg
moves too far across this time, off the thigh pad towards square leg, Sachin hurries across for the single even as the throw is lobbed in weakly
Sachin with the quick single again, this time he takes on mid on after a push in that region, and charges across, in a blur of pads, to make it safely
gets the front foot out and across, waits for the length ball to arrive, and blocks
mistimes the forceful push to shortish cover-point
short, wide, Sachin arrests his front foot movement, rocks back and times the cut past point
punched well off the back foot, he is timing them alright, straight to short cover though
slapped away to short cover as he tries to make some room
he was late into the push, but he is timing them so well, that it needed big dive from mid on to his left, and even then he could only parry away the ball
allows the nippy pitched up ball to come on and turns it to square leg
pushed to cover
back of a length ball whipped nicely, but Thirimanne is around at square leg and he puts in the dive to stop the ball
tries to make room and lash this length ball through point, finds the man
he's not holding back, tries the stroke again, and gets it down to third man
motions forward and across and defends this length delivery
thickish inside edge dribbles square on the leg side
bends the knee looking to time the cut past point, but cannot get hold of the shot as well as he wanted to
pulls out of the line of a short ball, then decides to have a go at the upper cut, misses
thick inside edge wide of mid on as he pushes forward
worked to midwicket
Virat reaches out to a widish one and squeezes it between cover and point, Dilshan chases and puts in the dive but a tad too soon, and the ball trickles past his reach
pushed hard, off the inner half of the bat wide of mid on
solidly behind the line of a length ball to defend
whipped wristily with fine timing and it travels quickly to fine leg
Prasad saves a certain four, Sachin had crunched the straight drive and it was flying down the pitch before Prasad decided to get a hand to it, brave
widish one cut wide of third man for a couple
this one bounces from a good length, Sachin is solidly across and rides the bounce to defend
left alone outside off
worked square on the leg side
well forward and checks the defensive push to mid on

whoa, he could have played on, he could have been caught behind, he was bending his knees, weaving away and wanted to steer a short of a length ball from middle and leg, way too close to do anything of that sort, and the edge runs past the keeper
worked to midwicket for one
length ball played out on the leg side
he hasn't held back at all today, this time he wants to cut off the front foot, but is not in a good position and is beaten
full on the pads, flicked wristily down to fine leg
super shot from Virat, the line was on leg, and Virat met the delivery with a whip of the blade, sending it racing through square leg
works off the pads again, and behind that man at shortish square leg
wanted to tuck this on the leg side and run, but ended up pushing the length ball to the bowler
pushes towards Malinga at mid off and rushes down for the single
short of a length ball whipped down to fine leg
worked to midwicket
holding its line from back of a length, blocked safely
thick outside edge to third man as he pushes at one angled in
shortish one, he looks to pull hard, but cannot connect
full on the pads, poor line, and Virat helps it fine on the leg side
pushes a short of a length ball on the off side
gets bat in front of pad and creates enough power on the flick to send it purring through midwicket
short and wide delivery, he slaps it to cover
bounce from way outside off stump, left alone
presses forward and defends on the off side
full from around the stumps, pushed to midwicket
paddles a full delivery from leg stump fine down the leg side, past short fine leg
full delivery worked with the spin through square leg
tossed up ball driven down to long off
straightens on middle and off, he comes across and works behind square leg
comes forward and defends a tossed up delivery
wide delivery cut in the air down to third man
worked from outside off to deep midwicket
beaten as he looks to cut a climbing delivery
stands in the crease and absolutely smokes the pitched up delivery to mid off
reaches out to a wide and full one and glides it past the slip to the third man boundary
lets a similar delivery go, slightly wider this one, and is called wide as well
rocks back and smacks the shortish one down to sweeper cover
leg stump line from around the stumps, worked easily through square leg
goes deep in the crease to nudge behind square leg
full delivery eased down to the man at long on
Virat with the whip-drive first time today, reaches out and gets a run to long off
too easy at the moment, another work behind square leg with the ball spinning on leg stump
pushed down to long off for one more, six risk-free singles off the over
good leave from Virat, lets this straightish one close to off stump go past
gets across and smothers a length delivery without fuss
pushed wide of extra cover for one
guided to point
punches the length delivery down to sweeper cover
tries to whip a back of a length ball but ends up pushing it back to the bowler
rocks back and tries to crash this length ball through the off side but mistimes it to extra cover
eased to cover off the front foot
appeal for lbw, that was close, it hit him on the back leg too as it came back in, replays show the bounce would have taken it over the stumps
left alone outside off

oh dear, Sachin has played on, he had earlier tried to steer Angelo from the middle and leg line, tried to back away again to one angled in and run it to third man from very close to off stump, and this time he chopped it on
goes after a wide delivery but Dilshan dives a long way to stop the stroke
pushed towards covers
worked towards midwicket for one
defended down the track
Rohit finds the bounce is too much from back of a length and somehow keeps it down on the off side
worked through square leg
left alone outside off
neatly forward and smothering it down the track
pitched up ball pushed firmly but straight to mid on
widish one dabbed down to third man
fine stroke from Rohit as he rocks back and pushes elegantly, but straight to point
tried to repeat the stroke but this one kept low and he underedged it on the bounce to slip
whipped through midwicket
flicked in the air but wide of mid on
back of a length ball worked to deep midwicket
Rohit hurried by the short ball, it did not get up much, he tried to swing it square on one leg, top edge landed safely in front of deep square leg, extremely lucky
pushed towards point
pushed back to the bowler
pushes forward and eases a pitched up ball to mid on
pushed away to point as it holds its line outside off
pushed towards covers
Rohit is hurried again by the short ball and awkwardly plays the pull
Virat is much more comfortable playing the pull, and slams the stroke in front of square leg
pushed back to the bowler
straightish delivery wide outside off
opens the face and defends towards cover, no single there

fine pull again from Virat, it looked like the short ball was getting on top of him, but he swivelled and played the stroke close to his helmet, fine leg dived across and parried the ball into the boundary
pushed on the off side for one
goes after this length delivery from the crease, thick edge flies past slip to the third man boundary
worked to deep midwicket off the pads
not that much width, but Rohit bends back and punches past point
drives the pitched up ball hard down to mid on
that came out of nowhere, Virat down the track and tees off over extra cover for a one-bounce four
worked to deep midwicket for one more
well forward and defends into the covers
pushed to Mahela at cover
goes hard at the pull as he swivels in the crease, collects two wide of deep midwicket

whoa, that has gone for four, back of a length ball, he picked it from well outside off stump, was in the air as he timed it past the man at mid on who had to give up the chase soon, that is also his 50
dabs a wide one down to third man

Super Dilshan grabs the screamer at point, short, wide, Rohit cracks the cut, does not bother to keep it down, it flies to Dilshan's left, he may be former captain but is still a top fielder, he reacts immediately, bends low to his left, pouches the ball safely and tumbles down only to be engulfed by his team-mates as he gets up
squeezes the angled delivery to Mahela at gully
chipped down to mid on, was in the air for a while
lovely line from Kula, Raina pushes forward to one leaving him with the angle close to off and is beaten
goes across and pushes to mid off
short of a length, tapped towards point from the crease
shot! some way to get going from Raina, forward to the line of the length delivery going across, and eases it past extra cover
worked from around off towards mid on, Virat is charging for the single as Raina takes a few steps out, but non-striker is sent back in time
thick edge flies over and behind point to third man as Virat goes after a pitched up ball
runs it down to third man from close to the body
dabbed down to third man for one
pushed down to wide mid off
lovely, just lovely strokeplay from Raina, if only he could develop his game against the short ball, leans forward into a pleasant push and the ball races past mid off
moves across and works from off towards midwicket for a quick single
thick outside edge runs to short third man as he pushes forward
too short, slapped away to sweeper cover
gets across and works in front of square, runs back for the second comfortably
down to long on
pushed back to the bowler
tossed up full ball eased down to long off
not fully forward, hesitant, gets across and blocks half-forward
and he is beaten now, this is superb bowling from Angelo, Raina is not getting forward, he moves across in the crease and looks to push on the leg side as the ball angles past the edge
straighter on middle and leg, and worked easily towards midwicket
length ball worked to deep midwicket for one
dabs this one with the angle down to third man
pushes off the front foot, point and cover converge on the ball, and Virat has to scramble back
well run, cuts a flat delivery wide of sweeper cover and gets back for two
firm push off the front foot but Dilshan drives to his right and saves one
guided to point
driven down to long off
punched down to long off
pushed to sweeper cover for one
straight short of a length delivery on middle, he gets around it and works it square
tries to squeeze a full and wide one through the off side but mistimes it back to Malinga
goes full for stumps, Virat tucks the low full toss through midwicket
Malinga tries the short ball, not a bouncer, but getting big on Raina, he does well to hop outside the line and tuck it, awkwardly alright, fine down the leg side
another short ball from Malinga, and again Raina is uncomfortable, he hops and tries to work it on the leg side, it loops up weakly to vacant backward square leg
Virat earns more points for his treatment of the short ball, Malinga sends in one at him, and he swivels immediately to time the pull, deep midwicket has work to do

well, he has indeed fallen to the short ball ultimately, it was nowhere as sharp as the short balls Malinga aimed at his ribs, it was angled across him, the pull was on, Raina went at it too eagerly, and it ballooned up high to settle into the hands of deep midwicket
pitched up delivery flicked to midwicket
flicked to fine leg
now Dhoni gets a short ball, swivels for the pull, and misses
left alone outside off
thick outside edge beats third man as Dhoni pushes well forward
phew, that was some pull from Virat, fetches the short ball from well outside off, and crashes it to the deep midwicket boundary, he is cramping up
but it is not affecting his shots, driven smoothly down to mid off, an overthrow results
fine stop from Chandimal at cover, Dhoni had slapped this short and wide one very hard, but chandimal got to it on the bounce with a dive
Dhoni done in by the short ball now, he was not in a good position to play the pull, but still went for it, the ball looped over Malinga at wide mid on, and he took a good catch running back
whips a back of a length ball through midwicket
left alone outside off
continues to work safely in front of square leg for runs
back of a length ball steered to third man
comes forward and defends tightly
that won't help Sri Lanka, ending on the pads with the angle, Virat helps it on its way fine
reaches out and pushes in the air past the bowler to mid off
shuffles across and keep strike with a work to deep square leg
worked to midwicket, he is not getting the single
pitched up delivery driven past the non-striker, mid on gets around to it
goes hard after the full one outside off, but it is the slower one, and he mishits it to extra cover
opens the face and dabs it to point
he is cramping, he is in pain, but he fetches this pitched up delivery from outside off and smacks it straight down the ground

Virat is down on the ground in pain, he might be gone too, a risky single it was going to be as he pushed to mid on and set off, a direct hit, and he is gone by miles, he is writhing in pain, but he will have to get up and walk back, needless single, it was the last ball of the over, did that have something to do with it? He is being helped off the ground now
back of a length ball pushed back to the bowler
defended back to the bowler
thick edge dribbles down to third man as Ashwin pushes at a pitched up delivery
pushed to sweeper cover off the front foot
runs it down to third man
pushed to cover
it is going to be difficult for the lower order against Malinga, Ashwin comes forward to a length ball which bounces and pops up in the air on the off side off the high part of the bat
gets forward and pushes a widish length ball to point
length delivery pushed off the front foot, it was in the air, but also in the gap between extra cover and mid off, not far from extra cover, but they have run three
short ball at 144 kph on leg stump, Jadeja allows it to pass over
brought his bat in front of pad just in time to work this one from the stumps towards midwicket
Malinga goes for the pitched up delivery on the stumps, Ashwin manages to work it in front of square leg
Kula gets one to hold its line on off stump, Ashwin is beaten as he looks to run it to third man
length ball on the stumps, worked through midwicket
pushed to sweeper cover off the front foot
beaten by the big bouncer as he looks to pull
low full toss worked to wide mid on, Jadeja is backing up and has to get back
eased off the front foot competently by Ashwin wide of mid off for one
Malinga pitches it up, Ashwin gets across and smothers it
full toss now, patted away wide of mid on for a single
short of a length, Jadeja hops and works it square on the leg side for one
well done, takes a hand off the bat as he nudges a shortish one behind square leg
swinging away a tad as he slings it in full, pushed to extra cover
goes on his toes to steer a short of a length ball to third man, no accurate yorker yet from Malinga
some width outside off and Jadeja uses it to cut for a couple wide of third man
handles the short of a length ball well again, opens the face late to run it to the right of third man this time, for two more
comes forward and drives the pitched up delivery to sweeper cover
this is tame stuff from Sri Lanka, gentle length delivery two feet outside off, easily steered to third man
sliced hard from the crease, a dive from Dilshan at point takes pace off the stroke
again Ashwin gets a wide delivery that he can easily steer to third man
coming in from outside off on a good length, nudged to the leg side
thick edge in the air to third man as Ashwin comes walking down the track
flashes at one leaving him with the angle outside off and is beaten
worked from middle and off towards midwicket for one
full one pushed down to mid on
pushed off the front foot through midwicket
worked straight to midwicket
down the track but again finds midwicket
succeeds on the third attempt as he skips out to push to long on
that will be four, goes for the cut to a flat and quick one, and it scurries well past short third man off the toe end of the bat
blocked off the front foot on the off side
worked in front of square leg for a single
runs this length delivery to point
goes for the drive to one pitched up and is beaten
shortish, wide, cracked to sweeper cover
tries to run this one down to third man but point gets to it
that is quite well played, waits for the length ball to arrive, and whips it from the crease in front of square leg
driven off the front foot through point, the throw comes in from the deep, but Jadeja has made his ground comfortably
starts off with a length ball, dabbed to point
goes for the full delivery on the stumps, Ashwin flicks in the air through midwicket
goes for the yorker, not quite in the blockhole, squeezed out to point
tries one more yorker, this ends as a very low full toss around leg stump, worked through midwicket
there comes the short ball, but Ashwin does well to drop his wrists and allows it to scream past

shot! that has gone all the way to the boundary, some timing from Ashwin, leans forward to a widish length delivery and times the push in the gap between extra cover and mid off, who ends up chasing it into the boundary
charges out and smashes the full delivery to sweeper cover
pushed to extra cover
pushed off the front foot, bowler gets a hand to it and parries it to mid off
he has time to get across and push the length delivery to mid on
pushes harder this time but mid off gets around to it
he even pulls, he gets four, he can't do anything wrong today, a short-arm pull, in the air, and down to the deep midwicket boundary, no desperation at all against the short ball, not even a hint
surprised as he this one bounces from a good length, and somehow jabs it down the track
works through midwicket for a single
ho ho, he shows the specialist batsmen how it is done, he steps outside his crease, takes on the short ball and clatters it to the deep midwicket boundary, again, completely in control

three men, one ball, and none could catch it, they stood and watched, Ashwin wanted to finish it  with a loft over mid off, mistimed it, the ball looped up wide of mid off, there were three men converging on it, each thought one of the other two would get to it, and none did, Ashwin smiles broadly as he completes the single
